Silver City - Do You Want (Private Agenda Remix)

Buy Physical Buy Digital Stream
Format: CD, Digital
Release Date: 9th November 2016
Label: Catune

Sometimes nice words go a long way. In the Summer of 2015, we sent a Soundcloud message to Kensuke at Catune to say how much we were enjoying their recent releases. He’d just put out Ichisan’s Mambo record which is still one of my favourite disco records of recent years – massively underrated I think.

He got back to us saying how much he liked our first release and wondered if we’d like to do a remix of a track off Silver City’s new record, Projections. That record is an abundance of riches but we opted for ‘Do You Want’, stretching the record out adding some additional vocals

Previous release: Sienna (Seahawks Remix) - Needwant Kollect
Next release: Ultramarine - Lo Recordings Spaciousness Compilation
